title: lol instal - repair
body:
reinstalled windows (7) . 
to save myself the trouble, i copy-paste  the game from *old windows*  to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends.  
it worked for a while, but yesterday it sudenly went to update large size of data, checked the folder and it was mostly empty, and the patcher was redownloading ~i think~ everything from the start.

so i went to do it right. i deleted everything and downloaded the game from start. 
it start to DL a 1.6GB file, half way stops, and they starts DL a 3.6GB file succesfully, then DL the 1.6GB file again.
all good till then , but when 1.6GB was downloaded, it went to download it again :(:(

i shut the installer, reopen it ,did not work, started repairing. and now i am stack in repair for some  hours without any progress. 

any similar experience?? i need some help

replies.body:
solved. 
repair did the job, slowily but yeah :)

Sorry for the slow reply first of all!!!

I'm glad you were able to fix things up with that repair. It sounds like when you copied the game files something might have been lost or damaged in the process. In the future, be sure to install the game in the normal way instead of copy/pasting files.
